verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> or <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> Keep not thou <S%H408>silence,<s%> <S%H1824><s%> O <S%H430>God:<s%> hold not thy <S%H2790>peace,<s%> <S%H408><s%> and be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H8252>still,<s%> O <S%H410>God.<s%>
For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> make a <S%H1993>tumult:<s%> and they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee have lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H7218>head.<s%>
They have taken <S%H6191>crafty<s%> <S%H5475>counsel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3289>consulted<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thy hidden <S%H6845>ones.<s%>

They have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us cut them <S%H3582>off<s%> from being a <S%H4480>nation;<s%> <S%H1471><s%> that the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> in <S%H2142>remembrance.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> they have consulted <S%H3289>together<s%> with one <S%H3820>consent:<s%> <S%H3162><s%> they are <S%H1285>confederate<s%> <S%H3772><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee:
The <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites;<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1905>Hagarenes;<s%>
Gebal, <S%H1381><s%> and <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H6002>Amalek;<s%> the <S%H6429>Philistines<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%>
Assur <S%H804><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H3867>joined<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them: they <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H2220>helped<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Do <S%H6213><s%> unto them as unto the <S%H4080>Midianites;<s%> as to <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> as to <S%H2985>Jabin,<s%> at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of Kison: <S%H7028><s%>
Which <S%H8045>perished<s%> at <S%H5874>Endor:<s%> they <S%H1961>became<s%> as <S%H1828>dung<s%> for the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
Make <S%H7896><s%> their <S%H5081>nobles<s%> like <S%H6159>Oreb,<s%> and like <S%H2062>Zeeb:<s%> yea, <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5257>princes<s%> as <S%H2078>Zebah,<s%> and as Zalmunna: <S%H6759><s%>
Who <S%H834><s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H3423>take<s%> to <S%H853>ourselves<s%> the <S%H4999>houses<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in possession.
O my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7896>make<s%> them like a <S%H1534>wheel;<s%> as the <S%H7179>stubble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
As the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>burneth<s%> a <S%H3293>wood,<s%> and as the <S%H3852>flame<s%> setteth the mountains on <S%H2022>fire;<s%> <S%H3857><s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> <S%H7291>persecute<s%> them with thy <S%H5591>tempest,<s%> and make them <S%H926>afraid<s%> with thy <S%H5492>storm.<s%>
Fill <S%H4390><s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> with <S%H7036>shame;<s%> that they may <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Let them be <S%H954>confounded<s%> and <S%H926>troubled<s%> <S%H5704>forever;<s%> <S%H5703><s%> yea, let them be put to <S%H2659>shame,<s%> and perish: <S%H6><s%>

That men may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> is <S%H3068>JEHOVAH,<s%> art the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
